projects.name: Colombo Rent a Car
projects.des: Colombo Rent a Car is a premier car rental service offering tailored transportation solutions. We delivered a comprehensive digital presence, including a responsive WordPress website, strong branding, and ongoing SEO optimization. Our social media marketing strategies enhanced their customer engagement and brand visibility across Sri Lanka.

projects.name: Colombo Transfer
projects.des: Colombo Transfer is a transportation business offering reliable transfer services. We delivered a visually compelling WordPress website along with strategic branding, SEO services, and social media marketing to improve their digital outreach and conversion rates.

projects.name: APS Tanzania
projects.des: APS Tanzania, a prominent construction business located in Tanzania, embraces innovative approaches to elevate customer satisfaction. Leveraging their expertise in web design and digital marketing, APS Tanzania creates visually captivating and user-friendly websites that seamlessly reflect their clients' brand identities. Through the optimization of website functionality and the implementation of result-driven marketing campaigns, APS Tanzania is committed to enhancing brand visibility, attracting a broader customer base, and fostering significant business growth in the construction industry.

projects.name: Shawlands Cleaning
projects.des: Shawlands Cleaning, a Glasgow-based cleaning business, employs cutting- edge strategies to elevate customer satisfaction.With their expertise in web design and digital marketing, Shawlands Cleaning crafts visually captivating and user - friendly websites that perfectly align with their clients' brand identities. By optimizing website functionality and executing result- oriented marketing campaigns, Shawlands Cleaning strives to boost brand visibility, attract a wider customer base, and foster substantial business growth.

projects.name: Gem City Palace
projects.des: Gem City Palace is a retail and e-commerce brand offering luxury products. We developed their website with e-commerce functionality and integrated it with an Odoo ERP system for seamless business management, inventory, and sales tracking.

projects.name: Wizkron
projects.des: Wizkron is a software solutions company that needed a standout landing page and a cohesive brand identity. We provided a Next.js-based high-performance website, complete branding including logo design, and a managed social media presence. Our SEO strategies helped the company gain visibility among startup and business audiences.

projects.name: RentingPal
projects.des: Rentingpal, a prominent apartment rental service based in Canada, is dedicated to establishing a robust market presence. With a strategic approach, Rentingpal aims to forge a unified brand identity for its rental solutions. Through the creation of a unique logo, cohesive visual components, and captivating messaging, Rentingpal strives to connect deeply with its target audience and stand out within the competitive realm of apartment rentals.

projects.name: The Secret Garden
projects.des: Mobile App user interface design & prototype.

technologies.technologyName: Frontend Mastery: React.js, Next.js, Angular, TypeScript, JavaScript ES6+, Alpine Js
Mobile Development: Flutter, Ionic, Cross-platform App Development
UI/UX Implementation: PrimeNG, ShadCN, Bootstrap, Tailwind CSS, Responsive Design
Animation & Interaction: GSAP, Three.js, Interactive Web Experiences
Backend Integration: MERN Stack, RESTful APIs, Node.js, Express.js
Database Management: MongoDB, SQL, Data Architecture
DevOps & Deployment: Docker, CI/CD Pipelines, Git Version Control
Performance Optimization: SSR, SSG, Lazy Loading, Code Splitting
Agile Development: Scrum, Sprint Planning, Cross-functional Collaboration

skills.skillName: 5+ Years of professional software development experience
Led frontend architecture for enterprise-level applications at Cerexio
Reduced development time by 30% through reusable component libraries
Improved test coverage by 40% with comprehensive testing strategies
Optimized performance by 40% through advanced React optimization techniques
Successfully deployed multiple mobile apps to App Store and Google Play
Full-stack expertise across the entire MERN development stack
Remote collaboration with international teams across Singapore and Australia

services.serviceDesc: Transform your ideas into powerful mobile experiences with cross-platform development expertise. I specialize in Flutter and Ionic frameworks to deliver native-quality apps for both iOS and Android platforms. From concept to App Store deployment, I handle the entire mobile development lifecycle including UI/UX implementation, API integrations, testing, and ongoing maintenance.
serviceKeyOfferings: App Store and Google Play deployment

services.serviceDesc: Create stunning, high-performance websites and web applications that drive results. With expertise in React, Next.js, and Angular, I build everything from simple landing pages to complex enterprise applications. Every project features responsive design, SEO optimization, and cutting-edge development practices.

Build scalable Software-as-a-Service platforms that grow with your business. I specialize in creating robust, user-friendly SaaS applications using modern tech stacks. From user authentication to payment processing, I handle all aspects of SaaS development including multi-tenancy, data security, and performance optimization.

Bring your designs to life with pixel-perfect implementation and enhanced user experiences. I collaborate closely with designers to transform mockups into interactive, responsive interfaces. My expertise includes modern CSS frameworks, animation libraries, and accessibility standards to ensure your digital products look amazing and function flawlessly.
serviceKeyOfferings: Interactive animations with GSAP and Three.js

services.serviceDesc: Establish your digital presence with cohesive branding and engaging social media experiences. I create custom web solutions that integrate seamlessly with your brand identity, including social media dashboards, content management systems, and brand-consistent web applications that amplify your online presence.
